title: riot u better give me a good reason for afk
body:
why is the server keep on getting me reconnect and people in the game remake and i got afk for the second time in a day??????
this is so broken that the first game today i reconnect 5 times and it didnt let me in. hope u guys can fix this.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems connecting to our game servers and getting in game.  Even if your leaves are not intentional, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat it equally because it causes other players a negative experience.  I recommend using this time to go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!

i have another question, one time i try to reconnect and it succesed but im stuck in the base and can only walk in base cant get out. i tryed  flash out and i cant do nothing besides quit again. it happened to me again before in bot game. that is kind of a bug.
